website_summaries.verdict: The Trend Tie from the Ecco Soft 7 line was lauded by many for its stylish good looks. It was deemed comfortable, with a true-to-size fit. Users were also pleased with the arch support it offered. Overall, many reviewers would recommend this shoe.It comes at a premium price of $160 that was nevertheless thought to be worth it by at least one purchaser. However, this sneaker only has a few color options. Also, it was found to be rather stiff compared with other models in the collection.
pros: The Ecco Soft 7 Trend Tie looks cute and stylish, commented most reviewers
It’s comfortable, lauded a lot of commenters
According to the majority of wearers, the sneaker fits true to size
There’s good arch support in the Ecco Soft 7 Trend Tie, revealed a couple of users
Although the price is high, at least one buyer thought that the shoe was worth it
Many purchasers would recommend this model to others
cons: The Ecco Soft 7 Trend Tie is only offered in a few colorways
At least a couple of reviewers thought that the Ecco Soft 7 Trend Tie felt stiff on feet compared to other Soft kicks

customer_reviews.title: but I also really hate to sacrifice style
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is everything I hoped for. I have really high arches so I need a lot of arch support, but I also really hate to sacrifice style. Usually pretty shoes with the kind of support I need are completely outside my budget, but these are great and affordable considering the quality you get. I will definitely continue to buy ECCO products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these shoes two times. In the first pair, it didn’t seem that the tongue was sewn in quite right. There was a spot on the front right that stuck down, and I was afraid it would cause a blister. I returned those and received another pair, and they were great. The color is more of a light gray, but I really like them and they are comfortable. I normally wear a narrower size, but these are good.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The Ecco sneakers size 39 are a great fit for me. I also have two pair of the Chase ll tie that are perfect for Tai Chi - flat, supportive, and flexible. The cork inner sole is removable for individual preferences, but does mold to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cute
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sneaker! Good arch support. Good looking shoe. Returned because I thought it was white. This color is an off white.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sachse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and comfort, slightly wider fit, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Ecco sneakers are the only ones I'm willing to pay this much for, and I've bought multiple. Excellent quality, comfortable for being on feet/walking all day, good fit for feet on wider side. I spray to waterproof 2x/yr and use cedar shoe trees between wearings and they hold up very well. Use shout wipes or sneaker wipes to keep rubber along soles white.
customer_reviews.author: sewist

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. But there was a sharp edge inside the ...

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Soft 7 Trend Tie Sneaker
product_meta.description: An on-trend full-grain leather long-lace sneaker with perfect detailing providing a premium look and feel.
feature_bullets: A cool contemporary looking long-lace sneaker constructed from rich full-grain leather for a light and soft feeling
Leather-covered inlay sole with ECCO Comfort Fiber System. Inaly sole is removable for the option of an extra width
Soft, comfortable combination leather and textile lining, ensuring a perfect inner climate
Direct-injected, two-component PU/TPU outsole. Highly comfortable, hard-wearing, light and flexible sole
A full anatomical last shape provides supremely comfortable fit and wear
